Description: AVAILABLE 9/1/23 is an East Side South Boston 4 bed 1.5 bath apartment. Beautiful renovations throughout. Large bedrooms, big windows, gleaming hardwood floors, & recessed lighting throughout. Laundry in unit. New stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, cherry cabinets.Balcony off the rear. Public transportation is right out front of the building. Just minutes to the beach, park, shops, stores, bars, & restaurants.
